review: We Have Chromecast for each both of our kids and our rooms.  They are easy to sync your phone/Tablet/computer to - as long as you have wi-fi.  I have noticed that if you are using it with a computer - you can also stream your computer webpage.  It worked great when we were playing a slideshow of photos from our computer, so everyone in the room could see them on the TV
author: Amy

review: Amazing product, great price and AMAZING SOEED OF SHIPPING!!
author: Dan Alvis

review: Should have gotten one much sooner. Only 4 stars because of the interference it causes with my cable and Xbox when plugged up.
author: Enyinna Akanwa

review: My TV was smart and supposedly able to connect wirelessly to my computer.  However, I was not smart enough to figure out how to do that.  So I finally bought the Chromecast and the connection process was simple enough even for me.  Good price.  Very good product - I have antenna TV reception so really appreciate using the internet for some programs and movies.  Wish I'd bought it sooner!!
author: mdkvegas

review: Works well. No issues so far.
author: Partha Sanyal

review: When I cut the cord, buying a Chromecast was the next step. I've loved it so much, I'm now buying one for the other TVs in my apartment.
author: Casidy Lemons

review: I have good internet, blazing speed and still lagged on my home network. Not a huge fan, used it once, now trying to figure out what to do with it
